name: MockFlow AnnotatePro
description:
Powerful annotation tool for illustrating your UI designs created with Figma



AnnotatePro provides


  • Exclusive components like callout, dimension, pointers, markers
  • Annotation effects like blur, pixelate, censor, spotlight and zoom parts of the design
  • 100's markup stickers for more vivid descriptions
  • Animated pointers to capture user attention
  • User interactive annotations to popup content (text, images, video) on specific design areas


AnnotatePro allows you to import Figma designs for annotations. And export annotated designs to your Figma frame all without leaving the editor.
